messages.content:
### Facts

The plaintiff, TechCorp, entered into a software licensing agreement with the defendant, SoftSolutions, on Jan 5, 2022. The agreement required SoftSolutions to deliver a fully functional software platform by March 1, 2022, and to provide ongoing maintenance. SoftSolutions failed to deliver the platform on time and delivered a defective version on March 15, 2022. TechCorp incurred significant losses due to the delay and defects.

### Issues

Whether SoftSolutions breached the licensing agreement by failing to deliver a functional platform on time and by delivering a defective product.

### Authorities

- UCC §2-601 (2020)
- Doe v. Roe, 456 U.S. 789 (2021)
